data.text: @GovCanHealth @philtastic @CanBorder Can you explain how a test taken shortly after entering the US by personal car and using that result to come home a few hours later is protecting Canada?  Can you get COVID within an hour of leaving Canada and present +ve on a test?  Haven’t found the science behind this yet.

@philtastic @CanBorder Hi, thanks for your question. There are no testing exemptions for short trips to the US but travellers now have the option of using a negative antigen test result, taken no more than 1 day before their arrival at the border, to fulfill their pre-entry testing requirement.
